Translations.Text: Say: It is communicated to me that a party of the jinn heard (the Quran) and said, “We have heard a wonderful Quran
It guides to the right way, so we have believed in it and we will never associate any partner with our Lord
And Exalted be the Majesty of our Lord, He has not taken a wife or a son
And the foolish among us used to say unjust (things) about God
And we thought that mankind and jinn never speak a lie against God
And persons from among human beings used to seek protection of persons from among the jinn so they increased them in error
And they (too) thought as you thought that God will never raise anyone (to life after death)
And we searched the sky but found it filled with strong guards and flames
And we used to sit in some of the sitting places thereof to hear, but now whoever hears, he finds a flame waiting for him
And we do not know whether evil is intended for those who are in the earth or their Lord intends (to guide) them to the right way
And among us are those who are righteous and among us (are those who are) other than that, we are sects following different traditions
And we know that we can neither defeat God in the earth nor can we defeat Him by flight
And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it, so whoever believes in his Lord, he should neither fear loss nor error
And among us are those who have submitted (as Muslims) and among us are those who are unjust. So those who have submitted (as Muslims) such have taken to the right way
And as for those who are unjust, they are the fuel for hell.”
And if they establish (themselves) on (the right) tradition We would give them to drink abundant water
so that We may test them thereby, and whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will cause him to enter severe punishment
And the mosques are God's so do not pray to anyone (else along) with God
And when the servant of God stood up to pray to Him they almost crowded over him
